ruleContent.content: @js:function tdv(b){b=atob(b);let bArr=[];for(let i=0,il=b.length;i<il;i++){bArr[i] = b.charCodeAt(i);}let s10=bArr.length/2,sb2 =[],i11,b10,b11;for(let i10=0;i10<s10;i10++){i11=i10*2;b10=bArr[i11];b11=bArr[i11+1];if(b10===-1&&b11===-2){sb2.push(' ');}else if(b10===13&&b11===0){sb2.push(' ');}else{sb2.push(String.fromCharCode(((b11<<8)&0xff00)|(b10&0xff)));}}return sb2.join('');}tdv('{{$.content}}').replace(/„ÄÄ„ÄÄ/g,'');
